channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
Can anyone help me with this client error?
[code]Divine Syndicate 2.0 is loading.. java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at client.drawLogo(client.java:3987) at client.startUp(client.java:9062) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6087) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Starting up 20 [/code]
